data.thought: S22|H|S20|Meta-notebook Phenotype D2: 'Reasoning Optimizer'. Analyzes Thoughtbox session transcripts. Identifies: (1) Redundant reasoning loops (2) Missed branching opportunities (3) Premature convergence (4) Under-explored hypotheses. Generates: optimized reasoning templates, better prompts, pattern recommendations. Observable: reasoning topology analysis, optimization suggestions, before/after comparison. Self-improvement loop: optimizer improves own reasoning patterns. Connects to DGM/CycleQD evolution in memory system.
